lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. approved applications for 34 bowl games for 2008, including 32 existing bowls and two new games in Washington and St. Petersburg, Fla. It also turned down a request for a proposed Rocky Mountain Bowl in Salt Lake City. The new bowl games for next season will be the Congressional Bowl in the nation’s capital and the St. Petersburg Bowl, which will be played at Tropicana Field between Dec. 20-23 and feature teams from the Big East and Conference USA. The Big East will no longer face a Conference USA opponent in the PapaJohns.com Bowl in Birmingham, Ala. Instead, the Southeastern Conference will provide the opposition.
